=== Summary ===
The »Places« panel in nautilus lags drag and drop support. It should be possible to drag a folder to the panel and it will be added to the bookmarks list of the »Places« panel, the menu and the file chooser.

=== Use cases ===
Bob wonders why he can not drop a folder to the panel to make it a bookmark.

Bob has two open Nautilus windows. He drags a panel bookmark from one window to another and wonders why the bookmark is not opened.
